title: Mumbai Court allows Police to withdraw TRP Scam case against Arnab Goswami, others
selftext: The Court allowed withdrawal of the case after special public prosecutor Shishir Hiray told the Court that continuing the proceedings may not lead to conviction but would only end up wasting the court's time
comments:
Oh my so much justice Modi ji is giving.. 

this is exactly why bjp supporters gas light citizens with "if you have a problem with it, file a case in court".  They have been told that the courts won't dare touch them. 

The courts are falling over each other to get their share of juicy bjp kickbacks it seems.
